New York. To learn of six people killed and 14 others shot at such an event-- including her close friend Gabrielle Giffords -- was tough for Kirsten Gillibrand . "It has been devastating," she said. I haven't had a more difficult week in my life, really. No one this close to me, as an adult, has been this close to being lost.
